title: Bon Jovi - Sessions From The Vault (Disc 4) - 320kbps
description:
1. Bon Jovi - I&#039;d Die For You [Preproduction Demo] 
2. Bon Jovi - Let It Rock [Preproduction Demo] 
3. Bon Jovi - Game Of The Heart [Preproduction Demo] 
4. Bon Jovi - Borderline [Preproduction Demo] 
5. Bon Jovi - Social Disease [Preproduction Demo] 
6. Bon Jovi - Livin&#039; On A Prayer [Preproduction Demo] 
7. Bon Jovi - Edge Of A Broken Heart [Preproduction Demo] 
8. Bon Jovi - Without Love [Preproduction Demo] 
9. Bon Jovi - Never Say Goodbye [Preproduction Demo] 
10. Bon Jovi - Raise Your Hands [Preproduction Demo] #1 
11. Bon Jovi - Raise Your Hands [Preproduction Demo] #2 
12. Bon Jovi - Never Enough [Preproduction Demo]

-These are the second set of demos from Slippery When Wet. These demos show the band rehearsing songs for Slippery before laying down the production demos to take into the studio with the producer. Some feature one really loud instrument with everything else quieter in the background, others are more balanced. A very interesting glimpse into the creative process.

For those of you only wanting the good studio demos, Sessions 5/8/9/10/11 are the best, so look out for them!
